en.planDescriptionHtml:
I can make illustrations and animations of people and monsters with the touch that I made for the explorers and NPCs in the replay videos "Banquet of those who go in the dark" and "Who is the swamp man? I can create illustrations and animations of people and monsters with the same touch that I used to create the explorers and NPCs in I also accept orders for characters in replay videos and secondary works.

Still Image
Approx. 5000yen
If you would like to create a PC character for TRPG, it would be easier if you could provide me with the character's personality and status as well as appearance.
If you would like to make a TRPG character, it would be easier if you could provide me with the character's personality, status, etc. If you want to add more, please contact us.

Animation
Approx.
The animation will be made by UgoIra.
Due to the specification of UgoIra, the size will be about 800x800, 24fps, about 6 seconds.
Please specify what kind of animation you want (if not, it will be standing breathing motion).
We will send you a png sequence (transparent background), mp4 and animated gif as a gift file.
We will send you a png sequence (transparent background), mp4, and animated gif as a gift file. ãƒ»If you would like to have multiple animations, we will charge +5,000 per item. If you would like more than one animation, we will charge you +5,000 per animation.

Please understand that we may not be able to accept your request due to schedule constraints [_;time]_.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Nice to meet you! I'm addicted to the Himawari Table at the Banquet of the Darkness, and I always enjoy watching your videos!
I would like to request a battle animation for my character in CoC.
I am a character who uses tonfa as a weapon, and I would like to see the motion of wielding the tonfa. I would like to request a motion to swing the tonfa.

I've posted the appearance of the character in the tag.
Also, the character sheet is listed on the drawing URL Iachara.
https://iachara.com/char/289478/view ...

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Hi Leah, I'm Siye, a Vtuber, and I'm always happy to help you.
I saw your request and I would like to send it to you.

I would like to ask you to draw a moving illustration of Cie herself.
I would like to have an image of her flipping through a book or taking something from a bookshelf, or a scene of book-related movement.

We plan to use your drawing on YouTube, Twitter, and other social networking sites.
We hope that you will enjoy drawing the image when we receive your request.

Thank you very much in advance.

If possible, could you please draw my character Lalafell (â™‚) from FF14?
The following URL is the material.
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Bage3fyY4iSPovkQwNRGgkbGbiQTV_r5?usp=sharing 

Regarding the facial expression, I would like to see
Reddening face and smiling.
Or, she is smiling like a mischievous child.
Can you please choose either of these expressions? Other than that, we can basically leave the composition, pose, situation, etc. to you. I would appreciate it if you could draw it in a way that is easy for you.

About the character
He is a cheeky boy around 18 years old, though his height is low. He has freckles.

Thank you very much for your consideration!

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
My name is Haru Shinri, I am a Vtuber and I am looking for Leah's request.
I am very happy to receive your request.

I would like to draw my own FA.
Can you please draw an animation with an atmosphere of moving candy apples and casting a spell?
I will leave the composition and pose to you.

We would like to use it for various social networking sites such as YouTube and Twitter.
Therefore, we would appreciate it if you could draw the tips of the head and the hair on the sides in such a way that the tips are not cut off.

As for the design, please refer to this three-view drawing.
 https://www.fanbox.cc/manage/posts/3571811

Also, if possible, would it be possible to have a transparent illustration of the person only...?
We would like to use it as a thumbnail, if possible.
If this is too difficult, please don't worry about it. Thank you very much.
requestTranslationProposal.requestProposalHtml:
My name is Haru Shinri, I am a Vtuber and I am looking for Leah's request.
I am very happy to receive your request.

I would like to draw my own FA.
Can you please draw an animation with an atmosphere of moving candy apples and casting a spell?
I will leave the composition and pose to you.

We would like to use it for various social networking sites such as YouTube and Twitter.
Therefore, we would appreciate it if you could draw the tips of the head and the hair on the sides in such a way that the tips are not cut off.

As for the design, please refer to this three-view drawing.
https://www.fanbox.cc/manage/posts/3571811

Also, if possible, would it be possible to have a transparent illustration of the person only...?
We would like to use it as a thumbnail, if possible.
If this is too difficult, please don't worry about it. Thank you very much.

en.planDescriptionHtml:
We're starting to take requests for a GW limited time only!
We'll be accepting Ugo-Illa's subject until 5/8!

I will draw a 2D animation within 5 seconds.
It will be easier for me to draw if you give me a brief description of the mood, requests, etc.

If you have a subject you would like me to draw, please feel free to send it to me!

en.planDescriptionHtml:
It would be helpful if you could specify whether you want a chibi character or a life-size drawing.
I'd be happy if you could specify whether it's a chibi character or a life-size drawing. You can draw something that I don't usually draw.
ã€€(Secondary works are based on the official rules.)
I'd like you to draw the background!
ã€€I want you to draw the background! I want you to draw several characters! If you have any questions, please feel free to ask.
ã€€I will try to prepare something suitable for you. (Chibi-e < life-size picture < Ugo-ira)

As for the gift file, I'll add a simple illustration as an extra for illustration requests, and a transparent GIF for UGOIRA requests.
The use of the extra illustration is limited to personal use (viewing, setting as a standby, etc.) and setting as an icon or header.
Please do not post the extra illustrations or use them commercially.
In addition, when using it as an icon or a header, trimming and some processing are OK.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
I always enjoy watching the Hitamabushi table replay videos.
If you get a chance, I'd love to see my boy drawn by Hisami!

Details of the request
I'd like to see some battle motions for the character I'm using in PBW.
I'm an electrician, so I'd like to see him discharging from the tip of his hand.
I'll take care of all the details and uncertainties!

[Setting] 19-year-old male daughter. Blonde hair and ponytail, pink eyes. Dressed in Harajuku style.
ã€€She's curious and inquisitive, and she's a tough guy who goes through the world with the tip of her tongue.
ã€€He's good at seduction, disguise and acting. His physical strength is not so great, but he is clever and fast.

Reference image
https://tw6.jp/character/status/f16385

Main applications
This is a private viewing.
We will post a message to Hisami that she created this work and introduce it on the SNS.

en.planDescriptionHtml: We accept requests for foot tickling and tickling in clothes. We will make GIFs with facial expressions or with a little bit of movement. Requests we receive will also be posted on fanbox. Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
I always enjoy Watamote's illustrations.
I would like to make the following request.

I am not popular because of you guys!
I've been trying to get Tomoki to like my hair and outfit, and I've ended up with an outfit like Mokko's.

The anime has three patterns of facial expressions.
(1) She turns her mouth into a grimace and says, "This guy has bad taste even though he's a slut," "I'm lame for matching a guy's taste," etc.
(2) But Yoshida would never do such a thing for me, she says with a smile and mounts it inwardly.
(3) When Tomotaka praises her, she turns her ears and cheeks and looks happy.

Thank you for your cooperation.
requestTranslationProposal.requestProposalHtml:
I always enjoy Watamote's illustrations.
I would like to make the following request.

I am not popular because of you guys!
I've been trying to get Tomoki to like my hair and outfit, and I've ended up with an outfit like Mokko's.

The anime has three patterns of facial expressions.
(1) She turns her mouth into a grimace and says, "This guy has bad taste even though he's a slut," "I'm lame for matching a guy's taste," etc.
(2) But Yoshida would never do such a thing for me, she says with a smile and mounts it inwardly.
(3) When Tomotaka praises her, she turns her ears and cheeks and looks happy.

Thank you for your cooperation.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Hello! Asuka Kabejiri's goi'ira was so well done, I'm sending you a request for one too!

I would like to see an anime where Iori Rinko tries to go through a hole in the wall in her Seiho Gakuen High School uniform, but her butt gets stuck and she struggles to get out of the hole.
I want to see it!

*Minor order.
Please draw a composition similar to the previous "Asuka's butt hole in the wall", showing the situation on both the breast and butt sides at the same time.
Please do not forget about the breast swinging and butt wiggling movements.
The uniform should be drawn with her breasts not fully closed so that the cleavage and purple bra can be seen, and the mini-skirt should not cover her huge buttocks so that the purple pants are fully visible.
Please do not depict finger-snap or other extreme scenes.

That's all. Thank you for your consideration!
requestTranslationProposal.requestProposalHtml:
Hello! Asuka Kabejiri's goi'ira was so well done, I'm sending you a request for one too!

I would like to see an anime where Iori Rinko tries to go through a hole in the wall in her Seiho Gakuen High School uniform, but her butt gets stuck and she struggles to get out of the hole.
I want to see it!

*Minor order.
Please draw a composition similar to the previous "Asuka's butt hole in the wall", showing the situation on both the breast and butt sides at the same time.
Please do not forget about the breast swinging and butt wiggling movements.
The uniform should be drawn with her breasts not fully closed so that the cleavage and purple bra can be seen, and the mini-skirt should not cover her huge buttocks so that the purple pants are fully visible.
Please do not depict finger-snap or other extreme scenes.

That's all. Thank you for your consideration!

1. If you are affected by the Region Lock, send me a DM

2. Choose from the characters in my work.

5. Please refer to my other works before requesting.

6. You can ask questions DM before applying for a request.

en.planDescriptionHtml: We accept requests for foot tickling and tickling in clothes. We will make GIFs with facial expressions or with a little bit of movement. In the case of secondary works, we cannot draw characters we do not know, so we may decline your requests. We may decline requests that are too detailed, as we may not be able to reflect them. Requests we receive will also be posted on fanbox. Thank you in advance for your cooperation.
en.planDescription: We accept requests for foot tickling and tickling in clothes. We will make GIFs with facial expressions or with a little bit of movement. In the case of secondary works, we cannot draw characters we do not know, so we may decline your requests. We may decline requests that are too detailed, as we may not be able to reflect them. Requests we receive will also be posted on fanbox. Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

en.planDescriptionHtml:
Those of you who are familiar with my YouTube channel will know what I mean.
I have a variety of different animation graphics and styles for each of the series I am hosting.

So I will take requests for animations that use graphics from my videos.

The description field of the plan can only hold up to 1000 characters, so I'm sorry to trouble you so much.
â†“ Please check here "Call for Requests and Channel WD Animation Plan Description".
illust/95973068



Basically, we plan to release animations with sound that show genitals, tits, anus, or excrement and internal organs that are shown as images on Nico Nico Douga as well.

Works without sound will also be available on pixiv.
If you request for a "Ugo-Ira", you can publish it as a "Ugo-Ira" on pixiv.

If you request it as an illustration, it will have to be done separately to be published as an illustration.
If you would like a character to appear in a video from the Channel WD series, it would be helpful for me if you could specify "illustration". The character you request will be featured in the Channel WD videos.
Example
illust/96511041

en.planDescriptionHtml:
If you would like a tickle illustration with feathers, hands, or tentacles that move a little, as we have already posted, please click here.
We would appreciate it if you could add a cost depending on the complexity of the character appearance and situation (gimmick, number of people).
Please note that the result of your request will be shown on your profile page, so please use anonymous requests if you wish to avoid this.
en.planDescription:

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Dear Mr. Ridge Night Candy
It is nice to meet you. I saw your illustration on Twitter and thought the expression of water was very nice, so I contacted you.
I am preparing to become a VTuber, and I would love to see your illustration in action, so I contacted you.
I am new to pixiv, so I am sure there will be some flaws, but thank you in advance.
I would also like to request a regular illustration, but would it be okay if I accept two GW campaigns at the same time?

Kokoru Fuyukai

en.planDescriptionHtml:
We're starting to take requests for a GW limited time only!
We'll be accepting Ugo-Illa's subject until 5/8!

I will draw a 2D animation within 5 seconds.
It will be easier for me to draw if you give me a brief description of the mood, requests, etc.

If you have a subject you would like me to draw, please feel free to send it to me!

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
In case you didn't get my message: 
Spanker: Nagisa Shiota (assasination classroom)
Spankee: Pit (Kid Icarus Uprising)

Situation: in a modern dance/music club. Nagisa is spanking Pit with a lightsaber to the beat of the music. (upbeat EDM) (like from star wars).

Position: Pit is bending over, sticking his bottom out.

Level of severity: even more intense than the last Pit animation. Nagisa spanks pits bare bottom with the saber, and Pits bottom is severely burned by every stroke by the lightsaber. Pits bottom becomes burned very quickly, and lights on fire after only a few swats, getting burned worse and worse as the spanking goes on. By the end, Pit' bottom is charred black, with bright red burn marks on his butt where the lightsaber spanked him.

Angles: I would like two views: one from the back at a slight angle fairly zooming in, giving a good view of pits butt. Also, i could like a side view that shows pits butt from the side and nagisa's butt. (Nagisa's butt is burned too.)

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal: As we discussed, I will give one part of the payment now and the rest after I see the animation. Since the minimum is 3000, I will pay the 3000 right now and maybe pay another 3000 for a total of 6000 (up from 4000) if I like the animation:)
requestProposal.requestOriginalProposalHtml: As we discussed, I will give one part of the payment now and the rest after I see the animation. Since the minimum is 3000, I will pay the 3000 right now and maybe pay another 3000 for a total of 6000 (up from 4000) if I like the animation:)

planDescription.planOriginalDescription:
Tell me exactly what you would like to see, but keep in mind that is has to be possible in Skyrim. Possible Characters include Liara T'soni, Yennefer von vengerberg, Triss Merigold, Elizabeth Comstock, Lara Croft, 2b, Tifa Lockhart and my Skyrim OC.
The price of your commission will depend on the video length.
